content: *give your tree a rustic feel with this beautiful granny square tree skirt yarnspirations * --- *skill level * intermediate --- **size ** *tree skirt * approx 46 \ 117 cm\ in diameter *motif * approx 7¼ \ 18 5 cm\ across top edge 12½ \ 32 cm\ across bottom edge and 10 \ 25 5 cm\ across side edges --- **materials ** patons® classic wool worsted™ 100 g/3 5 oz 192 m/210 yds * contrast a cherry 77710 *3 balls* * contrast b heath heather 77215 *2 balls* * contrast c peacock 00218 *1 ball* * contrast d yellow 77615 *1 ball* * contrast e natural mix 00229 *1 ball* * contrast f plum heather 77307 *1 ball* * contrast g pumpkin 77605 *1 ball* * contrast h taupe 00227 *1 ball* * contrast i moss heather 77525 *1 ball* *additional materials * 4 buttons approx ¾ \ 2 cm\ in diameter ---
